On this page

Core Publishing Services Processes ​

Overview ​

Publishing Services handles 12 different processes across the end-to-end publishing workflow. These processes support multiple business units in different geographies.

Process Workflow Stages ​

Text Reference ​

Content Planning and Research
         │
         ▼
Proposal and Commissioning
├── Proposal Review
└── EMSS Site Setup
         │
         ▼
Manuscript Development
         │
         ▼
Content Production
         │
         ▼
Printing, Warehousing and Publishing (P&E)
└── Gratis Copies Management
         │
         ▼
Post Publication Processes
├── Post Pub Corrections
└── Permissions Granting

The 12 Core Processes ​

Process CategoryProcess NameDescription
SetupEMSS Site Set-upConfigure manuscript submission environment
ContributorsList of Contributors ConfirmationVerify and confirm all contributors
ReviewProposal Review AdministrationManage proposal review workflow
CopiesGratis Copies ManagementHandle complimentary copy distribution
DataData ManagementMaintain data integrity across systems
AssessmentTechnical AssessmentEvaluate technical quality
AgreementsAgreements ManagementHandle author/contributor contracts
PayeePayee Information ManagementManage payment recipient data
PermissionsPermissions SeekingObtain rights from external holders
PermissionsPermissions GrantingProcess incoming permission requests
CorrectionsPost-Publication CorrectionsHandle corrections after publication
CRMCustomer Relationship ManagementManage stakeholder relationships

Supporting Processes ​

The following processes run alongside the main workflow:

  • Agreements Management - Contract handling throughout project lifecycle
  • Permissions Seeking - Proactive rights acquisition
  • LOC Administration - List of Contributors management
  • Technical Assessment - Quality evaluation
  • Data Management - System data synchronization
  • Payee Information Management - Payment processing support
  • Customer Relationship Management - Stakeholder communication

Process Volume Statistics ​

MetricAnnual Volume
Total Requests70,000
Total Projects6,000
System Record Updates10,000
Processes Handled12

Permissions Seeking in Context ​

Within the 12 processes, Permissions Seeking is one of the largest by volume:

WorkflowProjects/Year
S&T (Standard)1,480
HS (Health Sciences)770

Supported Workflows ​

  • Health Sciences (HS)
  • Clinics
  • RREF
  • Translations
  • APAC
  • Nursing
  • Journals
  • E-products (IPOC, Mosby Skills, Clinical Key Essentials, etc.)

ApplicationPrimary Use
RPCRights & Permissions Collector - System of record
